content.content: We need to remove the counter feature, and Write me an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde, consisting of multiple pages with sliding transitions. Include the following pages, each containing these exact phrases: 1. Welcome page: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.' 2. Authentication options page: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email' 3. Phone number input page: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number' 4. Verification code page: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567' 5. Email collection page: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address' 6. Welcome confirmation page: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs' 7. Terms and conditions page: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.' Ensure each page has a 'Next' or 'Continue' button to progress through the flow, and use 'Gyde' branding throughout.
content.summarized_content:
ChangeRequest:
  RemoveFeature: Counter
  NewFeature: Onboarding Flow
  AppName: Gyde
  AppType: Luxury Chauffeur Service
  Pages:
    - WelcomePage:
        Text: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.'
        Button: 'Next'
    - AuthenticationOptionsPage:
        Text: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email'
        Button: 'Next'
    - PhoneNumberInputPage:
        Text: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number'
        Button: 'Next'
    - VerificationCodePage:
        Text: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567'
        Button: 'Next'
    - EmailCollectionPage:
        Text: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address'
        Button: 'Next'
    - WelcomeConfirmationPage:
        Text: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs'
        Button: 'Continue'
    - TermsAndConditionsPage:
        Text: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.'
        Button: 'Continue'
  Branding: Gyde

content.overview: The application will undergo significant changes to remove the existing counter feature and introduce a new onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. This includes adding multiple onboarding pages with sliding transitions and updating the app's navigation structure.
new_features: Welcome page with 'Get Started' and introductory text
Authentication options page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email'
Phone number input page with phone verification prompt
Verification code page for entering received code
Email collection page for user email input
Welcome confirmation page with access confirmation text
Terms and conditions page with agreement text
modified_features: Update navigation flow to include new onboarding pages
Adjust app.router.dart to handle new routes for onboarding
removed_features: Counter feature from HomeView and HomeViewModel
content.architectural_changes: The routing setup in app.router.dart will be updated to include new routes for the onboarding flow. This will involve defining new views and view models for each onboarding page, ensuring they are integrated into the existing Stacked architecture.
cross_cutting_concerns: Ensure consistent use of 'Gyde' branding across all new onboarding pages
Implement sliding transitions between onboarding pages
Update dependency injection in app.locator.dart to include any new services required for onboarding

content.summarized_content:
overview: 
  - The application will undergo significant changes to remove the existing counter feature and introduce a new onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde.
  - This includes adding multiple onboarding pages with sliding transitions and updating the app's navigation structure.
new_features: 
  - Welcome page with 'Get Started' and introductory text
  - Authentication options page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email'
  - Phone number input page with phone verification prompt
  - Verification code page for entering received code
  - Email collection page for user email input
  - Welcome confirmation page with access confirmation text
  - Terms and conditions page with agreement text
modified_features: 
  - Update navigation flow to include new onboarding pages
  - Adjust app.router.dart to handle new routes for onboarding
removed_features: 
  - Counter feature from HomeView and HomeViewModel
architectural_changes: 
  - The routing setup in app.router.dart will be updated to include new routes for the onboarding flow.
  - This will involve defining new views and view models for each onboarding page, ensuring they are integrated into the existing Stacked architecture.
cross_cutting_concerns: 
  - Ensure consistent use of 'Gyde' branding across all new onboarding pages
  - Implement sliding transitions between onboarding pages
  - Update dependency injection in app.locator.dart to include any new services required for onboarding

content.content:
The public interface document has undergone significant changes, primarily focusing on the implementation of an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service called Gyde. 

Key Changes:

1. The architecture overview now includes the implementation of an onboarding flow with multiple pages and sliding transitions.

2. The dependencies have been updated to include new onboarding views such as welcome_view.dart, auth_options_view.dart, phone_input_view.dart, verification_code_view.dart, email_collection_view.dart, welcome_confirmation_view.dart, and terms_conditions_view.dart.

3. The description of the app structure has been updated to include routes for onboarding views.

4. The class diagrams have been updated to reflect the new onboarding views.

5. Several dependencies have been removed, including package:gap/gap.dart and package:stacked_services/stacked_services.dart.

6. The descriptions of the files have been updated to reflect their new roles in the onboarding flow.

7. The names of the files have been changed to reflect the new onboarding views.

8. Several methods, such as incrementCounter, showDialog, showBottomSheet, and runStartupLogic, have been removed.

9. Two new files have been added: terms_conditions_view.dart and main.dart.

10. The folder structure has been updated to include a new onboarding folder and remove the app, home, and startup folders.

11. The navigation flow has been updated to reflect the new onboarding flow.

12. The project description now includes a mention of the onboarding flow for Gyde.

13. The sequence diagram has been updated to reflect the new onboarding flow.

14. The state management flow remains the same but no longer mentions specific ViewModels. 

These changes significantly affect the app's structure and functionality, shifting the focus to the onboarding process. The new onboarding views and their dependencies have been added, and the sequence diagram and navigation flow have been updated to reflect this new focus.
